name: Web Google Docs
description: Google Docs is an online office suite. It allows users to collaboratively edit, process and search for doc/excel/ppt without installing official client software. DOC、XLS、PPT、CSV and other formats are supported with extendable storage space.

en_US.description: Google Docs is an online office suite. It allows users to collaboratively edit, process and search for doc/excel/ppt without installing official client software. DOC、XLS、PPT、CSV and other formats are supported with extendable storage space.
en_US.name: Web Google Docs

zh_CN.description: 谷歌文档是一套在线办公平台，它可以让用户通过网络协同编辑、处理和搜索文档、表格、幻灯片和表单，无需配套安装官方客户端软件，可以进行存储空间扩展，支持DOC、XLS、PPT、CSV等格式。
zh_CN.name: 谷歌文档网页版
